apps.name: TriviaFlix
apps.description: TriviaFlix offers over 53,000 unique and random questions to keep you entertained. Perfect for quizzes, game nights, or just challenging yourself!

apps.name: Yeti
apps.description: Customize your browsing by removing unwanted AI search results on Googleâ„¢ and applying your own custom CSS to any webpage.

apps.name: ProcrastiNOT
apps.description: Say goodbye to procrastination and hello to productivity with ProcrastiNOT! This extension is your personal productivity guardian, helping you stay focused and accomplish more, by blocking websites when your trying to get work done!

apps.name: Instant Incognito
apps.description: Instant Incognito automatically opens specific websites in incognito mode for enhanced privacy.

apps.name: Incognito Bear
apps.description: Just one click, Incognito Bear removes all NSFW contents or a list of your own from your browsing history, so you can enjoy worry-free browsing.

apps.name: Simple Screenshot Pro
apps.description: This tool brings ease and precision to capturing entire webpages or just the visible parts.

apps.name: Instant Flash Cards
apps.description: Turn any site into study vibes with one click. Instant Flash Cards is your hack to making learning stick.

opensource.name: Google Profanity Words
opensource.description: Full list of bad words and top swear words banned by Google.

opensource.name: Remove PII
opensource.description: Designed to help with privacy by removing personally identifiable information (PII) from text.

graveyard.name: What Coffee should I have?
graveyard.description: Not sure what coffee to have in the morning? Let us pick for you with over 35 different coffees and growing.

graveyard.name: Reddit: Random subreddit button
graveyard.description: Reddits new redesign removed the random button. I wanted it back. So here it is as a chrome extension.

graveyard.name: Clean my history
graveyard.description: Sometimes you forget to delete your history after viewing NSFW sites. Clean my History is a privacy focused Chrome extension that removes over 15,000 NSFW websites and terms from your history in one click.

graveyard.name: Netflix Hidden Categories
graveyard.description: Netflix Hidden Categories for Chrome allows you to search thousands of hidden categories that Netflix hides from you.
